thread.title: FAA reminds that Papal visit cities are No Drone Zones
thread.title_full: FAA reminds that Papal visit cities are No Drone Zones

author: eTN Global Editor
title: FAA reminds that Papal visit cities are No Drone Zones
text:
FAA reminds that Papal visit cities are No Drone Zones Original, timely global, travel, tourism, business news and research: 
Sep 22, 2015 eTN Exclusive: Unique and original, timely, global breaking news: 
WASHINGTON, DC - The Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) is reminding anyone who will be in Washington, DC, New York, and Philadelphia during the Papal visit that these cities and the surrounding communities are No Drone Zones from September 22 through September 27, 2015. 
The FAA has in place flight restrictions in and around Washington, DC (PDF), New York (PDF) and Philadelphia (PDF). Flying a drone anywhere during one of Pope Francis’ visits is against the law and may result in criminal or civil charges. All unmanned aircraft (UAS) – including radio-controlled model aircraft/UAS – are subject to FAA restrictions.
